
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```


```{r}
chr16 <- read_tsv("~/Desktop/chr16_roi.tsv",
                  col_names = c("Chrom", 
                                "Start",
                                "End",
                                "Sequence",
                                "Count",
                                "Strand"))
```
```{r}
chr16 <- 
  chr16 |>
  mutate(Midpoint = (Start + End)/2)
```
